## About Our SpaceApps History

Since 2015, we've been proud Local Leads for NASA's International Space Apps Challenge, a global 48-hour hackathon that engages thousands of problem-solvers across the world. Over the years, we've organized this event across multiple locations, including Linköping and Gothenburg in Sweden, as well as Craiova, Cluj, Bucharest, Timișoara, and Iași in Romania.

This archive celebrates the achievements of past participants and documents our journey organizing this prestigious global event.

## SpaceApps Challenge 2024 - Craiova, Romania

```{=html}
<div class="row mt-5">
  <div class="col-md-4">
    <img src="/assets/images/placeholder.jpg" alt="SpaceApps 2024 Craiova" class="img-fluid rounded">
  </div>
  <div class="col-md-8">
    <h3>October 5-6, 2024 | Hanul Doctorului, Craiova</h3>
    <p>The 2024 SpaceApps Challenge in Craiova brought together innovators for another exciting global hackathon, working on NASA's challenges to create space-related solutions.</p>
    
    <h4>Key Details:</h4>
    <ul>
      <li>Organized by Chenist Cybersecurity, Chenist Academy, and Şcoala Româno-Britanică</li>
      <li>Sponsored by Chenist Academy and ALM Power</li>
      <li>Partners included Chenist Digital, Cluster EduTIC, Caphyon.ro, and others</li>
      <li>Distinguished judging panel with Dr. Mirel Cosulschi, Dr. Mihai Gabroveanu, Florin Sanda, Adrian Tirsogoiu, and Mihai</li>
    </ul>
    
    <h4>Event Format:</h4>
    <p>Teams of up to 6 members collaborated over the 48-hour period, addressing NASA's challenges through innovative solutions. The event included mentorship, demos, and an official judging process.</p>
    
    <a href="https://www.spaceappschallenge.org/nasa-space-apps-2024/2024-local-events/craiova/" class="btn btn-outline-primary" target="_blank">Official Event Page <i class="bi bi-box-arrow-up-right"></i></a>
  </div>
</div>
```

## SpaceApps Challenge 2018 - Craiova, Romania

```{=html}
<div class="row mt-5">
  <div class="col-md-4">
    <img src="/assets/images/placeholder.jpg" alt="SpaceApps 2018 Craiova" class="img-fluid rounded">
  </div>
  <div class="col-md-8">
    <h3>October 19-21, 2018 | Museum of Oltenia, Craiova</h3>
    <p>The 2018 SpaceApps Challenge in Craiova brought together 87 participants forming 12 teams at the historic Museum of Oltenia to tackle NASA's challenges related to Earth and space.</p>
    
    <h4>Key Statistics:</h4>
    <ul>
      <li>87 total participants across 12 teams</li>
      <li>Hosted at the Museum of Oltenia Craiova (Strada Madona Dudu 14)</li>
      <li>Led by organizers Alin Mechenici and David Mitran</li>
      <li>Supported by sponsors including Caphyon, Syncro Soft, and PlusAqua</li>
      <li>Partners included IngeniusHub, Internet Oltenia, and Muzeul Olteniei</li>
    </ul>
    
    <h4>Winning Projects:</h4>
    <div class="card mb-3">
      <div class="card-body">
        <h5 class="card-title">People's Choice Winner: Sat0NE - "Colonizing Mars Tomorrow"</h5>
        <p class="card-text">A project focused on developing innovative solutions for Mars colonization challenges.</p>
      </div>
    </div>
    
    <h4>Other Notable Projects:</h4>
    <ul>
      <li><strong>GroundControlToMajorTom</strong> - "Virtual Space Exploration"</li>
      <li><strong>Dark Matter</strong> - "Spot That Fire!"</li>
      <li><strong>Hope</strong> - "Find My Cryosphere!"</li>
    </ul>
    
    <a href="https://2018.spaceappschallenge.org/locations/craiova/" class="btn btn-outline-primary" target="_blank">Official Event Page <i class="bi bi-box-arrow-up-right"></i></a>
  </div>
</div>
```

## SpaceApps Challenge 2016 - Linköping, Sweden

```{=html}
<div class="row mt-5">
  <div class="col-md-4">
    <img src="/assets/images/placeholder.jpg" alt="SpaceApps 2016 Linköping" class="img-fluid rounded">
  </div>
  <div class="col-md-8">
    <h3>April 22-24, 2016 | CreActive, Mjärdevi Science Park, Linköping</h3>
    <p>The 2016 SpaceApps Challenge in Linköping was a 48-hour hackathon that brought together programmers, designers, and space enthusiasts for interdisciplinary collaboration on NASA's challenges.</p>
    
    <h4>Key Details:</h4>
    <ul>
      <li>Organized by Navita Space with Alin Mechenici and Luiza Mara Timoc as local leads</li>
      <li>Hosted at CreActive, Mjärdevi Science Park (Teknikringen 7, Linköping)</li>
      <li>Teams worked on NASA challenges over the 48-hour period</li>
    </ul>
    
    <h4>Winning Projects:</h4>
    <div class="card mb-3">
      <div class="card-body">
        <h5 class="card-title">Judges' Choice & People's Choice: "Health Check"</h5>
        <p class="card-text">A solution for the AirCheck Challenge that aimed to crowd-source environmental and health data. Developed by Julian Grujicic, Mateusz Kloczko, Dmitro Petruk, Daniel Persson Proos, and James Omoya.</p>
      </div>
    </div>
    
    <div class="card mb-3">
      <div class="card-body">
        <h5 class="card-title">Judges' Choice: "LinFun - Immerse World"</h5>
        <p class="card-text">A solution for the Space Recreation Challenge, developed by Orlande Bidaux, Tofiqur Rahman, Jourdan Boubi, Soren Molander, Wim Cools, Pia Lodvedt, and Carla Cat Carlson.</p>
      </div>
    </div>
    
    <h4>Other Notable Projects:</h4>
    <ul>
      <li><strong>FunEx</strong> - An innovative space exploration project</li>
      <li><strong>Neo Early Warning System</strong> - A system for early detection of near-Earth objects</li>
    </ul>
    
    <a href="https://2016.spaceappschallenge.org/locations/linkoping-sweden" class="btn btn-outline-primary" target="_blank">Official Event Page <i class="bi bi-box-arrow-up-right"></i></a>
  </div>
</div>
```

## SpaceApps Challenge 2015 - Our Beginning

```{=html}
<div class="row mt-5">
  <div class="col-md-4">
    <img src="/assets/images/placeholder.jpg" alt="SpaceApps 2015" class="img-fluid rounded">
  </div>
  <div class="col-md-8">
    <h3>2015 | Our First Year as NASA Space Apps Local Leads</h3>
    <p>2015 marked the beginning of our journey with NASA's International Space Apps Challenge. Starting in Sweden, we took on the role of Local Leads, bringing this global hackathon to our communities and starting a tradition that would continue and expand over the years.</p>
    
    <p>Since then, we've organized the event across multiple locations in Sweden and Romania, building a network of space enthusiasts, developers, designers, and problem-solvers dedicated to addressing NASA's challenges.</p>
  </div>
</div>
```

## Impact and Legacy

```{=html}
<div class="row mt-5">
  <div class="col-md-12">
    <div class="card">
      <div class="card-body">
        <h3 class="card-title">Our SpaceApps Journey</h3>
        <div class="row">
          <div class="col-md-6">
            <h4>Locations and Growth</h4>
            <p>Over the years, we've expanded the SpaceApps Challenge to multiple locations:</p>
            <ul>
              <li><strong>Sweden</strong>: Linköping (2015-2017) and Gothenburg (remote editions during COVID)</li>
              <li><strong>Romania</strong>: Craiova (5 editions), Cluj, Bucharest, Timișoara, and Iași</li>
            </ul>
            <p>Each event has contributed to building local communities interested in space technology and innovation.</p>
          </div>
          <div class="col-md-6">
            <h4>Achievements and Recognition</h4>
            <p>Through our SpaceApps events, we've:</p>
            <ul>
              <li>Engaged hundreds of participants across multiple countries</li>
              <li>Facilitated the development of dozens of innovative space-related projects</li>
              <li>Connected local talent with global space challenges</li>
              <li>Built partnerships with universities, science parks, museums, and technology companies</li>
              <li>Created opportunities for international collaboration and knowledge exchange</li>
            </ul>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>
```
